Nancy works as a cook and needs a loan to buy pots, pans and ladles, that is, to replace her old cooking utensils. Nancy's job is the only income source in her house, which is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy pots, pans and ladles for her catering business.

loans.name: Pastora

texts.es: Pastora esta divorciada y tiene dos hijos con los que vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de propiedad de sus familiares Pastora es comerciante y necesita un prestamo para comprar chompas, chalinas, medias, guantes que serán muy útiles para sus ventas por la temporada de invierno Pastora es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar y por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Pastora is divorced and has two children whom she lives with in La Paz in a house built of brick and cement, which belongs to her family. 

Pastora is a vendor and needs a loan to buy jumpers, shawls, tights and gloves which will be very useful for her sales for the winter season. Pastora is the only income provider in her household and this is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy shawls, jumpers, tights and gloves for her business selling clothing.

loans.name: Sinsi Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe SINSI ont en moyenne  43 ans, 5 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à FARAKOLO l’un des quartiers  de la ville de  SAN/SEGOU (la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente des habits, des nattes, des condiments, et des céréales. Les femmes du groupe SINSI sont à leur  1er  prêt solidaire. ASSA 1ère femme assise de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo ;  compte utiliser son prêt pour  acheter 350Kg de riz. Elle s’approvisionne sur place et dans les villages environnants. Elle effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 20 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  l’habillement, aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women of the Sinsi Group are, on average, 43 years old and have five children.  They live in traditional, extended families in Farakolo, a district of the town of San/Segou (fourth administrative region of the Republic of Mali).  The women know one another through family ties, and sell clothing, tablecloths, food and cereals.

This will be the first group loan for these women.

Assa (sitting on the right in the photo) plans to use her loan to buy 350 kg of rice.  She buys the rice locally and in the surrounding villages, and sells it to both men and women, on a cash or credit basis.

Assa expects to make an average monthly profit of 20,000 francs CFA, which she will use to pay for healthcare, clothing and school fees.  The remainder will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia Carvajal es soltera pero tiene una hija y vive con ella en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino donde paga un alquiler Sonia es comerciante de arroz, entre las condiciones duras de su trabajo está el caminar con bolsas muy grandes llenas de arroz, haga frío o calor Además, Sonia viaja mucho para hacer sus ventas Sonia necesita un prestamo para incrementar la cantidad de quintales que compra, pues de esa manera el producto le saldrá mas barato y ella obtendrá una mejor utilidad con la reventa La hija de Sonia también trabaja, pero lo que ambas ganan no alcanza
texts.en:
Sonia Carvajal is a single woman who lives with her daughter in La Paz, where they rent a fine house. Sonia sells rice and needs to walk carrying very large bags, both in summer or winter. Moreover, Sonia travels a lot to sell her product. 

Sonia needs the loan to increase the amount of quintals she buys, so that the product will be cheaper and provide her with higher profits. Sonia's daughter also works, but they still do not earn enough to cover expenses.

loans.use: to buy larger quantities of rice for her food selling business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic everyday groceries to start her project of a grocery shop.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 39 años de edad, estudió hasta 8º grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y le ayuda en el trabajo agrícola, tiene 3 hijos, uno de ellos estudia 8º grado en la escuela. 

Jorge es ganadero y agricultor, es un trabajo familiar que viene desde hace muchos años en el cual se involucra toda su familia. 

El préstamo que solicita a CrediCampo lo necesita para comprar ganado. 

Él sueña con hacer mas grande su patrimonio y que su familia tenga lo propio para trabajar y darle el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 39-year old married man who studied up to 8th grade. His wife does house work and also helps with farming tasks. They have three children, one of whom is studying 8th grade in school. Jorge is a stockbreeder and a farmer. This job has been alive in the family for many years and all family members are involved. 

He is requesting a loan to CrediCampo to buy livestock. His dream is to increase his wealth and to provide his family with what they need to properly work and study.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: José Israel

texts.es:
José de 25 años de edad, estudió hasta 6º grado,  está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. 

José no pudo seguir estudiando por lo que se dedicó al trabajo agrícola, trabajo realiza desde hace 8 años y es una actividad familiar. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para la agricultura, comprará ganado, abono, fertilizantes y veneno. 

Él sueña con trabajar fuerte para tener un patrimonio para su familia, darle la educación a sus hijos y que tengan lo propio para trabajar.
texts.en:
José is 25 years old and has had an education up to sixth grade. He has a partner and she looks after the house. They have a 3-year-old son. José was not able to stay on at school so he started working in agriculture. He has been doing this for 8 years now and it is what his family do.

He will use the loan for agriculture, buying livestock, manure, fertilizers and poison. His dream is to work hard to have something to pass on to his family, and to give his children an education so that they are able to work.

loans.use: to buy livestock, manure, fertilizer and poison.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice for resale.

loans.name: Benkadi 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Tiala, un des villages de la commune de Niena dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Salimata assise à l’extrême gauche sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter les semences  et les intrants  pour entretenir  2 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, et à SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 180.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi I Group are all married women who are, on average, 43 years old and have four children.  They live in polygamous families in the village of Tiala, Niena commune, Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

The women want to improve their agricultural businesses during the winter months, so they work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso.  This will be their sixth loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Salimata (sitting on the far left of the photo) grows maize.  She plans to use her loan to buy seed and other agricultural products for her two hectares of land.  She sells her produce in the village and in Sikasso, to both men and women.

Salimata expects to make an average profit of 180,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  She will use this to repay her loan and help her husband with the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to buy seed and other agricultural products.

loans.name: Benkadi 2 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Tiala, un des villages de la commune de Niena dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Sanata debout au milieu. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte payer les frais de labour et acheter les engrais  pour entretenir  2 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 200.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi 2 Group are all married women who are, on average, 43 years old and have four children.  They live in polygamous families in the village of Tiala, Niena commune, Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

The women want to improve their agricultural businesses during the winter months, so they work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso.  This will be their sixth loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Sanata (standing in the centre of the photo) grows maize.  She plans to use her loan to pay the labour costs and buy fertilizer for her two hectares of land.  She sells her produce in the village and at other markets in Sikasso.  Her customers are men and women.

Sanata expects to make an average profit of 200,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  She will use this to repay her loan and help her husband to provide for the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to pay for labour costs and buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es: Tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos, el mayor de 26 años cursa su primer año de carrera universitaria y el menor de 21 años estudia su cuarto año de secundaria. Desde hace 14 años habita en una casa de tambo de madera. Con el objetivo de construir su vivienda de minifalda de concreto y madera, solicita financiamiento para comprar materiales de construcción: Bloques, cemento, hierro y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño Su sueño es brindarle a su familia una vivienda con las condiciones adecuadas y construir un muro perimetral, para que le brinde seguridad y confort a sus hijos.
texts.en:
She is 43, single and the mother of two children.  The eldest is 26 and is in his first year of university and the youngest is 21 and a senior in high school.  For 14 years she has lived in a stilt wooden home.  In an effort to have a house with a cement and wood foundation, she is requesting a loan to buy building materials:  blocks, cement, and iron, and to hire workers.

Her dream is to give her family adequate living conditions and build a wall around the house for more safety and comfort for her children.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: blocks, cement, iron, and to hire workers.

loans.name: Jenny Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jenny tiene 30 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos vive con llos padres en San Miguel Provincia de Bolivar.

Pertenece a la venatnilla Santiagueña esta ubicada en la Parroquia Santiago pertenece al Canton San Miguel A 15 minutos de la Oficina San Miguel en esta ventanilla tiene 12 miembros que se dedican a actividades agricolas como simbre de maiz, frejol  y papas, ademas de esto se dedican a la crianza de animales como gallinas ponedoras y engorde de cerdos.

Jenny se dedica a la agricultura y a la siembra de maiz, papas y frejol, ademas a la crianza de chanchos, gallinas y ganado vacuno. Nesecita el credito para la compra de semillas fertilizantes abonos ademas balanceado de engorde y crianza para los animales.

Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de San Miguel  y vende en la Feria de los Sabados en Chimbo. Ha enfrentado desafios como las plagas en el cultivo.

El sueño es mejorar los ingresos . Le gusta hacer deporte y celebrar las fiestas del patron de la salud.
texts.en:
Jenny, 30, is single and lives with her parents in San Miguel in the Bolivar Province.  She belongs to the Santiagueña communal bank located in the Santiago Parish which belongs to San Miguel Canton and 15 minutes from the San Miguel office.  There are 12 members in the group who work in agriculture growing corn, beans and potatoes, and also raise animals such as chickens and pigs.

Jenny works in agriculture and grows corn, potatoes and beans.  She also raises pigs, chickens and cattle.  She needs a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, composts and balanced animal feed.

She make her purchases in the city of San Miguel and sells her goods at the Saturday fairs in Chimbo.  She is up against challenges such as crop disease.

Her goal is to improve her income.  She enjoys sports and celebrating the festivities of the patron saint of health.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, composts and balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Benkadi 3 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI 3 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Tiala, un des villages de la commune de Niena dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Mamou debout en deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter les engrais et payer  le frais de labour    pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 130.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Benkadi 3 Group are married women who average 43 years of age and four children each. They all live in polygamous families in Tiala, one of the villages in the commune of Niena, in the third administrative region of Mali, Sikasso.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are seeking their sixth loan from the MFI, the previous ones were repaid without problems.

They grow corn, just like Mamou, the second woman from the right in the standing row in the photograph. With her loan, she intends to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost to maintain 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the production is sold in the village and at the markets in Sikasso, to a clientele comprising both men and women.

Mamou intends to turn an average profit of XOF 130'000 per planting, which will enable her to repay the loan and also help her husband cover daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost

loans.name: Benkadi 4 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI 4 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Tiala, un des villages de la commune de Niena dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Setou assise à l’extrême gauche sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter  les engrais et payer frais de labour   pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 190.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Benkadi 4 Group are married women who average 43 years of age and four children each. They all live in polygamous families in Tiala, one of the villages in the commune of Niena, in the third administrative region of Mali, Sikasso.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are seeking their sixth loan from the MFI, the previous ones were repaid without problems.

They grow corn, just like Setou, the woman sitting on the left in the photograph. With her loan, she intends to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost to maintain 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the production is sold in the village and in Sikasso, to a clientele comprising both men and women.

Setou intends to turn an average profit of XOF 190'000 per planting, which will enable her to repay the loan and also help her husband cover daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost

loans.name: Benkadi 5 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI 5 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Tiala, un des villages de la commune de Niena dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Batoma assise au milieu sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte payer le frais de labour et les engrais  pour entretenir  0,5 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 95.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Benkadi 5 Group are married women who average 43 years of age and four children each. They all live in polygamous families in Tiala, one of the villages in the commune of Niena, in the third administrative region of Mali, Sikasso.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are seeking their sixth loan from the MFI, the previous ones were repaid without problems.

They grow corn, just like Batoma, the woman in the middle of the sitting row in the photograph. With her loan, she intends to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost to maintain 0.5 hectare.

After the harvest, the production is sold in the village and at the markets in Sikasso, to a clientele comprising both men and women.

Batoma intends to turn an average profit of XOF 95'000 per planting, which will enable her to repay the loan and also help her husband cover daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay plowing cost

loans.name: Kato Allama 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe KATO ALLAMA 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Bougoulaba, un des villages de la commune de Wateni dans la 3ème région administrative du Mali : SIKASSO. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Sanata debout au milieu. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter  des intrants et de semences agricoles pour entretenir 2  hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 250.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Kato Allama 1 Group are married women who average 43 years of age and four children each. They all live in polygamous families in Bougoulaba, one of the villages in the commune of Wateni, in the third administrative region of Mali, Sikasso.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are seeking their sixth loan from the MFI, the previous ones were repaid without problems.

They grow corn, just like Sanata, the woman in the middle of the standing row in the photograph. With her loan, she intends to buy fertilizers and seeds to maintain 2 hectares.

After the harvest, the production is sold in the village and at the markets in Sikasso, to a clientele comprising both men and women.

Sanata intends to turn an average profit of XOF 250'000 per planting, which will enable her to repay the loan and also help her husband cover daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: María Candelaria

texts.es:
María tiene 50 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y al jornal, solo tienen un hijo. 

María se levanta a las 4:30 AM junto a su esposo  para realizar  las actividades de ordeño y prepararse para ir a la parcelas donde cultiva, este trabajo de la agricultura se lo enseñó su esposo, durante la mañana trabaja junto a su esposo e hijo en las parcelas que alquila, en el transcurso de la tarde su esposo cuida las vacas y Maria se dedica a los oficios domésticos.	

El crédito lo necesita para comprar los insumos agrícolas para la siembra (semilla, abono, veneno, rastriada, etc).
texts.en:
Maria, 50, has a sixth grade education.  She is married and her husband works in agriculture and also as a wage earner.  They have a son.

Maria gets up at 4:30 a.m., and she and her husband milk the cows and get ready to go work on their cropland.  Maria learned the trade form her husband.  In the morning she works with her husband and son on the land they rent.  In the afternoon her husband takes care of the cows and Maria does the housework.

She is in need of a loan to buy farm supplies for the planting season (seeds, compost, weed-killer, a plow, etc.)

loans.use: To buy farm supplies for planting season (seeds, compost, weed-killer, a plow, etc.)

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es:
Lleno y con una  alfombra hecha de hojas de repollo caídas  en el piso, así luce el stand  de Narciso luego  de finalizar  una  larga jornada  de trabajo.  Desde hace treinta años se dedica a vender repollo  al por mayor y  lo comercializa en el  mercado  de su  ciudad. Su esposa e hijos lo apoyan atendiendo  a todos los visitantes que consumen estas hortalizas  para preparar deliciosas ensaladas.
Sus ventas han  sido fabulosas en  estos últimos años, ha logrado mucha popularidad por la calidad del producto y la fina atención.   Sus clientes le pasan la voz a otros nuevos,  lo que ha generado excelentes ganancias. Narciso planea comprar un camión pequeño para  distribuir repollo a otras regiones. El solicitó un financiamiento en  KIVA Mi Crédito,  ya que a través de esta institución es posible que su proyecto se cumpla.
texts.en:
After a long day's work, the floor of Narciso's stall is covered with cabbage leaves.  For 30 years he has been selling cabbage wholesale and also at the city market.  His wife and children help by attending to customers who visit to buy vegetables for salad.

Sales have been great over the last few years, due to the popularity of his product and good customer service.  His customers have told others about him which has generated excellent profits.  

Narciso plans to buy a small truck so he can deliver cabbage to other regions.  He has requested a Kiva loan through Mi Crédito so he can carry out his project.

loans.use: To buy a small truck to deliver cabbage to other regions.

loans.name: Ana Paula

texts.es:
Ana tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta 3º grado, es madre soltera de 3 hijos y solo 2 de ellos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad. 

Ana se dedica a vender frutas en el mercado de la ciudad y también se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura. 

El préstamo solicitado lo utilizará para la agricultura, comprará abono, veneno y el pago de mano de obra. 

Ella planea darles la educación a sus hijos y que tengan un patrimonio para poder trabajar en lo propio.
texts.en:
Ana, 38, has a third grade education.  She is a single mother  and has three children, two of which attend the community school.  Ana sells fruit at the city market and also works in agriculture.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy compost and weed-killer, and to hire workers for her agriculture business.  

She wants to give her children an education and for them to have their own patrimony so they can work in the same business as she does.

loans.use: To buy compost and weed-killer, and to hire workers for her agriculture business.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo tiene 55 años de edad, no pudo asistir a la escuela, actualmente está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen una hija de 15 años que estudia 8º grado, y además Leonardo tiene otras 2 hijas de otro matrimonio y viven con él.

Desde su infancia Leonardo 1le ayudaba a su padre a sembrar hortalizas y granos básicos y así fue aprendiendo el oficio, actualmente va a sembrar 1 hectárea de maíz en un terreno que esta a 5 mts de su vivienda, además trabaja ajeno en la agricultura  o cuida ganado. 

El préstamo lo necesita exclusivamente para comprar insumos agrícolas, abono y fertilizantes, mejorará el negocio pues con las abonadas tendrá mejores plantas y por ende mejor producción.

Sueña con ver a su hija terminando por lo menos el bachillerato y además tener y gozar de buena vida para seguir trabajando para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo is 55 years old and did not go to school. He is married and his partner works taking care of the household chores. They have a 15-year-old daughter, who is in 8th grade. He has two more daughters from another relationship, who live with him.

Leonardo helped his father to grow vegetables and grains when he was a little boy, and this is how he learned to work in agriculture. He will now sow corn in a one-hectare piece of land located next to his house. He also works for others, growing crops or taking care of livestock.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as different types of fertilizers. His business will improve because by fertilizing the soil, he will have better plants and thus better produce.

His dream is to see his daughter finish at least high school. He also hopes to live a good life in order to continue working to maintain his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, such as different types of fertilizers.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio Juan se dedica al negocio de botica,el socio vende medicamentos y tambien el socio tiene un carro que realiza servicio de transporte,el socio trabaja en la botica desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de botica.El socio solicita el credito para comprar medicamentos para la botica.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juan is a member that works selling medicines. He also has a car with which he offers transport services. Juan works from 8:00 am until 3:00 pm and does well with his business. He wants to get ahead with his pharmacy and his dream is to expand his business.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy medicines for his pharmacy. He feels happy with this loan and promises to pay the installments on time.

loans.use: to buy medicines for his pharmacy.

loans.name: Herbert Ernaides

texts.es:
Herbert tiene 48 años de edad, estudió hasta 7º grado, actualmente está soltero con 2 hijos a cargo, uno trabaja con él y el otro estudia primer año de bachillerato, además de sus dos hijos una tía vive con en casa. 

Él se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura y aprendió debido a que su padre lo llevaba a sembrar, cuando iba creciendo trabajaba como mozo y ahora en lo propio siembra en verano 3 hectáreas y cuenta con ganado propio y va al potrero. 

Herbert necesita del préstamo para pagar el alquiler de tierra con el fin de sembrar maíz y otra parte para que su ganado ande pastoreando. 

Sueña más que todo con tener una vida para seguir trabajando en su negocio de comercializar ganado y con las ganancias para la educación de sus hijos y darle todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Herbert is 48 years old. He went to school through the 7th grade. Now he is single and is raising two children. One of them works with him and the other is in his first year of high school. In addition to his two children, an aunt lives with him. 

He has worked in farming his whole life and he learned about it when his father would take him to plant. When he got bigger he worked as a laborer and now he does his own farming. In the summer he plants 3 hectares and he has his own cattle and grazes them.  

Herbert needs the loan to pay for renting land in order to plant corn and also to graze his cattle. 

He dreams more than anything of having a life to keep on working in his cattle selling business and with the profits pay for his children's education and give them everything they need.

loans.use: to pay rent on the land in order to plant corn as well as to graze his cattle.

loans.name: Migdalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
El delicioso aroma a tortilla recién hecha levanta  a todos los vecinos de Migdalia. Sus tortillas se volvieron populares en su comunidad.  Aparte del maíz y la leña, ella le agrega un ingrediente especial, las prepara con mucho amor y empeño.  Su compañero de vida la ha apoyado desde sus inicios. Él se encarga de recibir el dinero  que pagan los clientes diariamente. Su esfuerzo vale la pena, porque  está consiguiendo  excelentes ganancias. 
La  demanda de tortillas  aumenta y cada día recibe nuevos  visitantes en su hogar.  Por lo tanto, Migdalia solicitó un préstamo en KIVA Mi Crédito para la compra de maíz y leña. De esa forma no sufrirá escasez alguna y podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. En el futuro planea remodelar las instalaciones de su cocina, también  adquirir una estufa industrial.  Su meta es que su negocio se convierta  en la tortillería más importante de su comunidad.
texts.en:
The delicious aroma of freshly made tortillas awakens all of Migdalia's neighbors. Her tortillas have become popular in her community. Apart from the corn and the firewood, she adds a special ingredient: she makes them with a lot of love and hard work. Her life's companion has helped her from the beginning. He is in charge of receiving payment from the customers every day. Her hard work is worth it because she is making excellent profits.  

The demand for the tortillas is increasing and every day she gets new visitors in her home. Because of this, Migdalia has asked for a loan from KIVA Mi Crédito to buy corn and firewood. This way, she won't have any shortages and will be able to satisfy her customers' needs. In the future, she plans on remodeling her kitchen and acquiring an industrial stove. Her goal is for her business to become the most important tortilla business in her community.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Fredis Humberto

texts.es:
Fredis tiene 57 años de edad, estudió hasta 3º grado, está casado y tiene 2 hijos que ya trabajan y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos. 

Fredis se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, toda su vida se ha desempeñado en este negocio, lo aprendió por medio de su padre, su trabajo y su cultivo se encuentra a 30 minutos de su casa y con él se involucran sus hijos. 

El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar semilla, fertilizantes, herbicidas y pagará mano de obra para cultivar, mejorará su vida ya que podrá cultivar y tener ingresos al final de la cosecha. 

Él espera que su cultivo se desarrolle en buen estado y que tenga un rendimiento alto, las ganancias las utilizara para comprar ganado.
texts.en:
Fredis is 57 years old. He studied until the 3rd grade. He is married and has 2 children who work and his wife is in office domestics for a living.

Fredis is in agriculture and livestock for a living. All his life he has been employed in this business. He learned it from his father. His work and his farm are 30 minutes from his home and his children are also involved.

He needs the loan requested to buy seed, fertilizer, herbicide and to pay for manual labor to cultivate. He will improve his life so that he will be able to cultivate and have income at the end of the harvest.

He hopes that his crop grows in good condition and that he will have a high yield. He will use the income to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, and to pay for manual labor to cultivate.

loans.name: Jhon Roland

texts.es:
El socio Jhon Roland se dedica al negocio de ganaderia,el socio los hace engordar y crecer a los ganados y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de ganados.
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jhon Roland works in the cattle business. He raises and fattens up cattle and later sells them in different markets. He works from 8:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m. He wants to get ahead through this work and his dream is to expand the cattle selling business.

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Yimy

texts.es:
El socio Yimy se dedica al trabajo como mototaxista,el socio tiene una moto que realiza servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es comprarse una moto nueva.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su moto.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Yimi works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He has a motorcycle that provides taxi service in the different streets. He works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm and has been in this business for several years and it is going very well.  His dream is to purchase a new motorcycle. He asks for the loan to purchase tires for his motorcycle.

He is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his motorcycle.

loans.name: Ángel Abelino

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 37 años de edad, estudio hasta 5º grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 4 hijos que viven en casa y los 4 están estudiando.

Ángel se dedica a la agricultura y también es empleado en una empresa en la cual ya tiene 5 años de laborar, el trabajo le queda a una hora de su casa y viaja en bus urbano. 

Con el préstamo que ha solicitado comprará láminas, cementos y ladrillos para mejorar su casa y así poder vivir en mejores condiciones. 

Él sueña con ampliar su casa y que su familia pueda vivir en mejores condiciones y así no sufran peligros por las tormentas en el invierno.
texts.en:
Ángel is 37 years old, he studied to the 5th grade, he is in a relationship and his partner takes care of the household chores.  He has 4 children who live at home and the four of them are students.

Ángel works in agriculture and also is employed at a business where he has been for 5 years as a laborer.  His job is an hour away from his house and he travels by city bus to get there.

With the loan that he has requested, he will purchase metal sheets, cement and bricks to improve his house and to be able to live in better conditions.

He dreams of expanding his house and that his family can live in better conditions and, so, not to suffer from the dangers of the winter storms.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheets, cement and bricks to improve his house.

loans.name: Ana Yamileth

texts.es:
Ana tiene 36 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor y tienen seis hijos de los cuales solo dos asisten a la escuela los otros cuatro ya están acompañados.

Ana aprendió el trabajo de agricultura (siembra maíz) gracias a su padre quien fue agricultor toda su vida, en esta actividad se involucran 4 hijos y su esposo, además Ana trabaja elaborando tortillas de maíz.


El crédito será invertido para comprar insumos agrícolas, con el financiamiento se está ayudando a que Ana pueda sembrar el cultivo de maíz.


El sueño de Ana es sacar adelante a sus dos pequeños hijos, ayudarles a que continúen estudiando y se preparen, también le gustaría mejorar su vivienda y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 36 years old, she went to school until the 9th grade, she is married and her husband is a farmer.  They have six children, of whom only two go to school, the other four are partnered.

Ana learned agricultural work (growing corn) thanks to her father who was a farmer his entire life. Four children and her husband are involved in this work; in addition, Ana works making corn tortillas.

The loan will be invested in purchasing agricultural supplies, the loan is helping Ana be able to plant the corn crop.

Ana's dream is to help her two young children get ahead, help them continue studying and preparing themselves, and also she would like to improve her house and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to grow corn.

loans.name: Martha Patricia

texts.es:
A simple vista la pulpería de Martha luce pequeña, sin embargo,  cuenta con todos los productos necesarios para llenar las despensas  de muchos hogares. En ella, ofrece condimentos, bebidas, dulces, granos básicos, pan, detergentes, también  cuenta con un mostrador en donde exhibe artículos para niños como cremas corporales y ropa interior.  Todos los días atiende a sus clientes con elegancia y una enorme  sonrisa  en su rostro. 
Martha desea continuar invirtiendo en su negocio, anhela verlo crecer hasta convertirlo en una mini distribuidora.  Su primer paso fue solicitar un financiamiento  en KIVA Mi Crédito para la compra de Granos basicos tales como: Arroz, Frijoles, Azucar, Aceite, Bebidas, Dulces entre otros,  ya que son los que tienen más demanda entre sus clientes.  Ella tiene mucha fe,  confía que de la mano de esta institución, poco a poco sus sueños se irán haciéndose realidad.
texts.en:
At a simple glance, Martha's general store seems small, however it has all the products needed to fill the pantries of many homes. In it, she offers condiments, drinks, sweets, basic crops, bread, detergent, and also has a counter where she displays children's items such as body creams and underwear. She serves her customers every day, and with a large smile on her face.

Martha wants to continue investing in her business and wishes to see it grow until it is a mini-distributor. Her first step was to ask for a loan through Kiva Mi Crédito in order to purchase staple crops such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, drinks, and sweets, among other products, since those are what have the highest demand among her customers. She has a lot of faith and trusts that from the hand of this institution, little by little her dreams will become true.

loans.use: to purchase staple crops such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, drinks, and sweets, among other products.

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Teresa tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta 5º grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Tienen 5 hijos de los cuales solo 2 de ellos asisten a la escuela.

Teresa ha trabajado en la agricultura desde los trece años de edad ya que sus padres fueron agricultores, trabaja con su esposo y siembran a 200 mts de su casa y además realiza las labores del hogar.

El crédito sera invertido para cultivar un área de 14,000 mts de maiz.

El sueño de Teresa es mejorar la calidad de vida y tener ganado, espera tener salud para poder seguir trabajando en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Teresa is 38 years old, she studied until the 4th grade, and she is married and her husband works in agriculture.  They have 5 children of whom only 2 go to school.

Teresa has worked in agriculture since she was thirteen years old, since her parents were farmers. She works with her husband and they plant 200 meters from the house and she also does the household work. 

The loan will be invested to plant an area of 14,000 meters of corn.

Teresa's dream is to improve the quality of life and to have cattle. She hopes to have the health to continue working in agriculture.

loans.use: to plant an area of 14,000 meters of corn.

loans.name: Maria Lidia

texts.es:
La socia Maria Lidia  se dedica al negocio de venta de tejidos y telares, la socia vende diferentes tejidos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos y telares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Maria Lidia works selling knitted and woven products, she sells various knitted products.  She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm and already has 8 years in this business and it is going well.  Her dream is to expand her business of knitted and woven product sales. She asks for this loan to purchase knitted and woven products.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to purchase knitted and woven products.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia Gregoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y el va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de jugos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar frutas como papaya,naranjas y fresas para los jugos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Gregoria continues working in juice sales. She works from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, she has already worked for several years in this business and it is going well. Her dream is to expand her juice business. She asks for this loan to purchase fruits such as papayas, oranges, and strawberris for the juices.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase fruits such as papayas, oranges, and strawberries for the juices.

loans.name: Adalinda

texts.es:
Adalinda tiene 40 años de edad, es una mujer que se esfuerza por ver crecer sus hijos con bienestar. Ella está casada y su esposo se dedica a las actividades agrícolas, juntos trabajan duro para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Pudo estudiar solamente cuarto grado, teniendo que abandonar sus estudios para dedicarse al trabajo arduo.

Su principal actividad es realizar los quehaceres del hogar, desde que se casó, también  le ayuda a su esposo en las actividades agrícolas. Desde hace dos años, elabora pan (quesadillas) para vender en el cantón, y esta actividad productiva la realiza dos veces por semana.

El préstamo solicitado a CrediCampo, lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas, ya que ha comenzado la época lluviosa, condición que favorece el establecimiento de cultivos. Al ayudarle con el financiamiento,  podrá cultivar y tener el sustento de su hogar  para el próximo año.

Su sueño es poder capacitarse en cultivos de hortalizas, en esta actividad ve la oportunidad de obtener mejores ingresos y considera que este rubro es rentable.
texts.en:
Adalinda is 40 years old; she is a woman who strives to see her children grow with well-being. She is married and her husband works in agriculture, together they work hard to improve the living conditions of their family. She only could go to school until the fourth grade, and had to leave school to dedicate herself to this arduous work. 

Her primary work is to do the household chores since she got married, and also to help her husband with the farm work. For the past two years she has made bread (quesadillas) to sell in the canton, and she does this work twice a week. 

The loan requested from CrediCampo is needed to purchase agricultural supplies, since the rainy season has begun, a situation with favors the planting of crops. By helping her with the financing, she will be able to plant and have the sustenance for her household for the next year. 

Her dream is to be able to be trained in growing vegetables; she sees this as an opportunity to increase her income and thinks that this job is profitable.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Manuel Alexander

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 28 años de edad, es un hombre afanado por buscar el bienestar de su familia, en su cantón es conocido como alguien trabajador y honrado. Él está acompañado y su pareja realiza los quehaceres del hogar, cuida a sus 2 hijos y además se dedica a la crianza de especies menores. 

Él trabaja en la agricultura desde que era un niño, su padre le enseñó este oficio a sus hermanos y a él;  cultivan maíz, frijol y maicillo, también, trabaja como ayudante de albañil, esto lo aprendió gracias a un amigo. Las actividades agrícolas las realiza de lunes a sábado; tiene que caminar a diario alrededor de 5 kilómetros para llegar a su milpa.

El préstamo que ha solicitado lo utilizará para comprar los insumos agrícolas (fertilizantes, semilla productos fitosanitario, etc.) pues ya se acerca la época lluviosa, por lo tanto es necesaria la preparación del terreno y  tener los insumos para el adecuado manejo de cultivos, por ello ha decidido buscar el financiamiento a través de un crédito. 


Su sueño es especializarse en albañilería, para la obtención de mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 28 years old, and is eager to look out for the well-being of his family. En his canton, he is known as someone hardworking and honorable. He is partnered and his partner takes care of the household chores, takes care of their two children, and also works raising small animals. 

He has worked in agriculture since he was a child; his father taught the work to this siblings and to him. They grow corn, beans, and sorghum. In addition, he works as a helper in construction, which he learned thanks to a friend. He does the farm work Monday through Saturday, and has to walk about 5 kilometers daily to get to the cornfield. 

The loan that he has requested will be used to purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seed products, pesticides, etc.) since it is almost the rainy season, so he has to prepare the land and have the supplies for the adequate care of the crops. For this reason, he has decided to look for financing through a loan.

His dream is to specialize in construction work and to get better income.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seed products, pesticide, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some small tools and inventory of spare parts for selling.

loans.name: St.james School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Moses. He is the Deputy Head teacher of St. James day & boarding primary School, a mixed school in the Peri-urban area of Entebbe in Wakiso with 300 students. St. James Primary School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long-term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

St. James School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. This will be supplemented by the sale of carbon credits, which the school will generate from using the water tank. Moses ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his student’s concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students

loans.name: Citizen School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Christine. She is the Head Teacher of Citizen Primary School, a mixed school in the Peri-urban area of Masajja in Wakiso with 600 students. Citizen Primary School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long-term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. Christine ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve her student’s concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Dora Victoria Muñoz

texts.es:
No sólo  el arco iris de  colores, de la  ropa  que ofrece Dora en su tienda de segunda mano,  es lo que  llama la atención de los visitantes, sino las marcas  de todas sus prendas.  En ella, se puede encontrar artículos de buena calidad por menor  precio.  Desde hace cinco años que se dedica a este negocio y conoce los gustos  de los clientes.  Su esposo e hijos son un pilar esencial en su vida porque la apoyan trabajando en el local. 
Su propósito es atraer más clientela, exhibiendo variedad de prendas y accesorios que llamen la atención.  Por lo que decidió recurrir a KIVA Mi Crédito, para la compra de calzado y bolsos. De esa forma su local estará completo y sus visitantes no buscaran artículos en otra tienda.
texts.en:
Not only the rainbow of colors of the clothing that Dora sells in her second-hand store calls the attention of the visitors, but also the brands of all the clothing. In this store, one can find good quality clothing for lower cost. For the past five years, she has worked in this business and knows her customers' tastes. Her husband and children are an essential pillar in her life because they help her working in the shop.

Her goal is to attract more customers, showing a variety of clothing and accessories that capture their attention. For this, she decided to turn to Kiva Mi Crédito, for the purchase for footwear and bags.  In this way, her shop will be complete and her visitors won't look for things in another shop.

loans.use: to purchase footwear and bags.

loans.name: María Ester

texts.es:
Ester tiene 21 años de edad, es una  joven laboriosa y emprendedora, todos los días se levanta  para ir al trabajo pensando en el bienestar de sus dos hijas. Ella está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como ordeñador de ganado bovino en una hacienda  ganadera de la zona.

Ella tiene un comedor en el pueblo, en un puesto que alquila en el mercado, trabaja en esto desde hace 5 años; se aventuró con este negocio gracias al apoyo de una amiga, quien le enseño este oficio.

El préstamo lo necesita para pagar una deuda, ella tiene un préstamo que viene pagando mes a mes sin ningún problema, esto con las ganancias del negocio, pero por problemas de salud (embarazo) tuvo que realizar unos gastos y  tuvo un retraso, por lo que la institución financiera le ha dado un tiempo límite para cancelar la deuda en su totalidad, pero ella en este momento no cuenta con la cantidad completa. 

Su principal deseo es poder trabajar con capital propio, también, sueña con adquirir  un local propio para el negocio, ya que alquilando, considera que una gran parte de la ganancia se queda en el pago de este.
texts.en:
Ester is 21 years old and is a hardworking and enterprising young woman. Every day she gets up to go to work thinking of the well-being of her two daughters. She is partnered and her partner works as a cow milker in a cattle farm in the area. 

She has a restaurant in the town, in a place she rents in the market. She has worked in this for the last 5 years, she started in this business thanks to the help of a friend who taught her the job. 

She needs the loan to pay off a debt. She has a loan that she has been paying monthly without any problems, with the earnings from her business, but for health reasons (pregnancy) she had some expenses and got behind. For this reason, the financial institution had given her a limited time to pay off the debt completely but at the moment she doesn't have the full amount.

Her primary desire it to be able to work with her own capital.  Also, she dreams of getting her own place for her business, since she is now renting and a large part of her earnings go toward paying that.

loans.use: to pay a debt.

loans.name: Amigos Del Milenio Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “AMIGOS DEL MILENIO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
La socia Sonia tiene 55 años de edad ,04 hijos y es conviviente, la socia  alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de imprenta, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de papeles, tintas entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de ferretería, venta de productos de belleza, llamadas telefónicas, venta de productos de belleza, trabajadores del sector privado.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "Amigos del Milenio" communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member Sonia is 55 years old, has four children, and is in a common-law marriage. The alternates between her daily activities and her printing business. She has had this business for years and it's going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She is a responsible and hardworking person; she would like to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family.

Sonia is requesting the loan for the purchase of paper, ink, and more. The other members earn their livings with a hardware business, by selling beauty products, by selling phone calls, and by working in the private sector. Sonia feels grateful for the loan granted and she promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase paper, ink, and more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more palm oil, charcoal and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Kassim

texts.fr:
Monsieur KASSIM est né en 1982 à SIKASSO, marié  il réside avec son épouse chez son père à MEDINE un quartier populaire dans la ville de Sikasso  troisième région administrative de la république du Mali.
Monsieur KASSIM est technicien de santé en plus il mène des activités d’achat et de vente des médicaments essentiels depuis plusieurs années. Avec une telle expérience dans ce domaine, il jouit d’une forte réputation.Il décide de rejoint à institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle il est à son premier prêt qui lui permettra d’augmenter son fonds de commerce pour en fin de répondre aux attentes de ses clients.
Il s’approvisionne auprès de la pharmacie en fin de les revendre dans sa clinique. Ainsi ce  premier prêt i compte acheter  10 cartons de  sirop nivaquine, 15 cartons de paracétamol plus des quantités importantes de médicaments essentiels pour la revendre au détail à une clientèle composée d ‘hommes et de femmes  au comptant et à crédit.  
Avec ce premier prêt il envisage réaliser un bénéfice moyenne mensuel de 55 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour résoudre  ses dépenses et payer les prêt et son intérêts.
texts.en:
Mr. KASSIM was born in 1982 in SIKASSO. He is married and lives with his wife at his father’s house in MEDINE, a working-class district in Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). Mr. KASSIM is a health care technician. In addition, he has been working at buying and selling essential medicines for several years. With such experience in this domain, he enjoys a solid reputation.

He decided to join the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and is now on his first loan with it enabling him to increase his business capital, so as to respond to the expectations of his customers. He gets her supplies from pharmacies to be resold in his clinic. Thus, with this loan, he intends to purchase 10 boxes of of nivaquine syrup, 15 boxes of paracétamol, and more significant quantities of essential medicines for retail sale to men and women customers paying with cash or credit. 

With this initial loan, he envisions making an average monthly profit of 55,000 francs CFA that will be used to cover his expenses and pay back the loan with interest.

loans.use: to purchase medicines for a clinic

loans.name: Benkadi 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans et ont en moyenne 6 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des familles traditionnelles à DIOMATENE  un village dans la commune de DOGONI dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec madame PORTIO débout à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI 1. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des semences 4 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 4 bidons d’herbicide de marque différente et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  140 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d'autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group BENKADI 1 are married women, who average 38 years of age and six children each. Most of the women live in traditional families in DIOMATENE, a village in Commune de DOGONI, in Cercle de SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). 

The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their fifth farm loan with Soro Yiriwaso. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with Ms. PORTIO, who is standing second from the right in the photo in this women’s group BENKADI 1. With this loan, she intends to purchase some seeds, four 50-kg sacks of fertilizer, and four containers of different brands of herbicides and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash or credit in the village and at SIKASSO markets. She plans on making an average profit of 140,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her in part to pay back the loan with interest, as well as to help out her husband in meeting day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, farm inputs, and seeds and to cover the cost of plowing

loans.name: Benkadi 2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 7 membres du groupe BENKADI 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans et ont en moyenne 6 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des familles traditionnelles à DIOMATENE  un village dans la commune de DOGONI dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec madame FATOUMATA débout à la deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI 2.

Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d'autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The seven members of the group BENKADI 2 are married women, who average 36 years of age and six children each. Most of the women live in traditional families in DIOMATENE, a village in Commune de DOGONI, in Cercle de SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). 

The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their fifth farm loan with Soro Yiriwaso. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with Ms. FATOUMATA, who is standing second from the left in the photo in this women’s group BENKADI 2. With this loan, she intends to purchase some seeds, four 50-kg sacks of fertilizer, and four containers of different brands of herbicides and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash or credit in the village and at SIKASSO markets. She plans on making an average profit of 140,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her in part to pay back the loan with interest, as well as to help out her husband in meeting day-to-day family expenses.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a married lady, 30 years old. She is married to Felix who helps in adding income to the family. Caroline is blessed with four children, between 7 and 11 years old. Caroline owns a beauty salon in Kabarnet and has been in operation for a period of one year. She earns a monthly income of 6,000 KES.

Caroline has applied for her first a loan of 10,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya and she wishes to use this amount to purchase a stock of beauty products for her salon. The profits she earns will be used to reinvest back to her current business. Her dream is to see her business growing.

loans.use: To purchase stock of beauty products for her salon

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en:
Micheal is 39 years old. He is married and has been blessed with two children. He has been running his business of selling vehicle spare parts for 13 years now. He currently makes an estimated monthly income of 82,000 KES (Kenyan shillings).

He would like a loan of 100,000 KES, through which he will expand his business by buying more motor vehicle spare parts to sell to clients in his area. This will increase his income. He has successfully repaid his previous loan, this being his fourth loan term.

He will use his anticipated profits to expand the business further. In the future, he hopes to open more shops for selling spare parts to expand his market. He also hopes to keep his family well provided for.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts of motor vehicles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, bread and cooking seasonings to expand her food business.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de preparacion de tortas,la socia prepara tortas,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tortas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para preparar la torta como harina,mantequilla,azucar y huevos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Teodora continues with her business of making cakes. She has been doing this for a number of years and things are going well for her. Her dream is to expand her business. Teodora is requesting this loan to buy ingredients to prepare the cakes like flour, butter, sugar and eggs. The member is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, butter. sugar and eggs to make cakes.

loans.name: Marcia Liset

texts.es:
María Liset tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil casado tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, como papa a la huancaína, cebiche, tallarines, con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para mejoramiento de infraestructura del local donde atiende a sus clientes, dicha inversión le servirá para brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa en tener en mejores condiciones su negocio para poder satisfacer las necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
María Liset is 31 years old, married and has one child. She lives with her family in the district of Oyotún located in Cutervo Province, which belongs to the Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. In this rural area the people work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

María sells meals like "papa a la huancaína" (potatoes in spicy cheese sauce), ceviche, and noodles. With more than 5 years experience in the business she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 3,000 PEN to make improvements to the place where she serves her clients. This investment will help her offer better service to her clients and it will have a large effect on her business. The client believes that having better conditions in her work place will help her satisfy the needs, demands and tastes of her clients in the area.

loans.use: to make improvements on the shop where she serves her clients.

loans.name: Santa

texts.es:
La señora  Isabel de 50  años de edad  es casada y vive  en su casa de habitación con su esposo se dedica a la compra de leche para elaborar cuajada, su negocio es en su casa de habitación, donde sus clientes le visitan para comprar su deliciosa cuajada, sus clientes son todo los vecinos de sus aldea, Ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 10 años, radica en aldea la cuesta al sur de Honduras. 
Doña Isabel esta solicitando 11, 000.00 lempiras para compra de leche para hacer su cuajada. Y Con las ganancias y el apoyo de este préstamo  desea salir adelante y seguir mejorando sus ingresos. 
Doña Isabel su sueño es seguir creciendo más en su negocio.
San Lorenzo, Honduras – Abril 2014
texts.en:
Mrs. Isabel is 50 years old; she is married and lives in her house with her husband. She buys milk to make cheese curds. Her business is in her home where her customers visit her to buy her delicious cheese curds. Her customers are all the neighbors from her village. She has been doing this activity for 10 years. She lives in the village La Cuesta in South Honduras. 

Mrs. Isabel is asking for a loan of 11,000.00 lempiras (Honduras’s currency) to buy milk to make her cheese curds. With her profits and the support of this loan she hopes to move ahead and continue improving her income.

Mrs. Isabel’s dream is to continue growing her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras –April 2014

loans.use: to buy milk to make cheese curds for her business

loans.name: Sohibnazari

texts.ru: Сохибназари 21-летний ювелир из района Кубадиён. Он в течение 2,5 лет работает ювелиром в своей мастерской, расположенной на центральном рынке. Сохибназари занимается изготовлением и починкой ювелирных изделий из серебра и золота. Он опытный мастер и за короткий срок приобрел своих постоянных клиентов. Сохибназари работает в своей мастерской без выходных. Он еще холост и пока все свое внимание уделяет развитию своего дела. В данный момент Сохибназари просит кредит. Он планирует купить два ювелирных оборудований - вальс и цезер и расширить свою деятельность. Сохибназари является активным молодым человеком. Он одновременно учится еще в институте, в заочном отделении факультета "Финансы и кредит". У него большие планы на будущее.
texts.en: Sohibnazari is a 21-year-old jeweler from the Qubadiyon District. He has worked as a jeweler for two and a half years in his workshop, located in the central market. Sohibnazari manufactures and repairs gold and silver jewelry. He is an experienced craftsman and in a short period of time, he has acquired loyal customers. Sohibnazari works in his workshop seven days a week. He is still a bachelor and for now, all of his attention is devoted to the development of his business. Sohibnazari is currently requesting a loan. He plans to buy two types of jewelry-making equipment and expand his business. Sohibnazari is an active young man. He simultaneously studies at an institute, through correspondence classes in the "Finance and Lending" Department.. He has big plans for his future.

loans.use: to buy jewelry-making equipment.

loans.name: Alfonce

texts.en:
Alfonce is 44 years old, married, and has three children, aged 17, 12 and five years old. He has a retail shop in Kangundo town and has run it for five years. 

This is Alfonce's first loan term with VisionFund Kenya and he plans to use the loan to buy more stocks of sugar, maize flour, rice, cooking oil, milk, and bar soap to sell. He anticipates generating more income which he will use to pay school fees for his children. 

Alfonce hopes to improve his business and educate his children. He dreams of having a stable business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of sugar, maize flour, rice, cooking oil, milk, and bar soap to sell.

loans.name: Ygnacia

texts.es:
Ygnacia tiene 50 años de edad, conviviente vive en casa propia con dos hijos (13 y 7 años) respectivamente, persona con buenas referencias en el distrito de Pacanga vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que pertenece a la Provincia de Chepen ubicada en la Región La Libertad.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como gallinas borregos y cuyes desde hace más de 05 años aproximadamente, su esposo siembra esparrago en su propia parcela.

Yganacia ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ygnacia is 50 years old and lives with her partner and two children aged 13 and 17. She has good references in her community in the district of Pacanga, which belongs to the Province of Chepen located in La Libertad Region. The people of this community work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

Ygnacia has been raising and selling animals like chickens, lambs and guinea pigs for about 5 years. Her husband plants asparagus on his own land. Ygnacia is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 PEN to buy a greater quantity of animals to offer to her clients.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals to offer to her clients.

loans.name: Arus

texts.en:
Arus lives in Armavir town with her husband and two school-age children.
 
Arus is involved in a retail business. For more than five years, Arus has traded clothing and home supplies. She receives the stock from abroad with the help of her parents-in-law who live there. 

Arus has now requested this loan to be able to buy new stock of supplies to sell to her customers. She has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for a new stock of clothing and home supplies to sell.

loans.name: Ivis Karelys

texts.es:
El trabajo duro y la constancia es un factor importantísimo para llegar al éxito y eso lo tiene muy claro Ivis, una joven de 20 años de edad que se capacito en el área de la cosmetología, esto la llevo a iniciar con su proyecto emprendedor de montar una sala de belleza y masajes.
Lleva con su negocio aproximadamente 4 meses y ha podido gozar de muy buena acogida por su buen servicio y calidad.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos para el cuidado de la piel y el cabello al por mayor y de esta forma obtener mejores utilidades.
Comprando estos elementos tendrá la oportunidad de ofrecerles a sus clientes mayor variedad y calidad.
Es una mujer con grandes aspiraciones y voluntad para realizar sus sueños.
texts.en: Hard work and perseverance are important factors in achieving success and Ivis understands this well. She is 20 years old and is trained in cosmetology. This led her to start a project opening a beauty salon and message parlor.  She has been running this business for 4 months and has enjoyed a warm welcome due to her good service and high quality. She is requesting a loan to invest in buying products to care for the skin and hair wholesale and thus make more profit. Buying these items she has the opportunity of offering her clients more variety and quality. She is a woman with great ambition and the will to realize her dreams.

loans.use: to buy skin and hair care products to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase palm oil, rice and cooking seasonings to start up a food stand business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cartons of chicken.

loans.name: Parijat Self-Help Group-2

texts.en:
Rina is a 34-year-old married woman with two daughters. She stays with her husband and children in a house made of mud and tiles as roof. Her elder daughter is studying in sixth grade while the younger one stays at home as she is too young to go to school. 

Rina is a member of Parijat Self-Help Group hailing from Kalilashpur village, West Bengal. She runs a small medical shop. She started this business at her residence a few years ago with a small amount of capital from her savings, and over the years the business has been improving.
 
Rina makes modest profits, but most of what she earns is spent on day-to-day expenses. She now wants to enlarge her business for which Rina is asking a loan to buy more medicines to stock up. 

Rina is looking forward to making better profits and giving her family a better quality of life. She hopes to open a big medical store and also wants to save enough for her daughters’ education.

loans.use: to buy more medicines to stock up.

loans.name: Cosmas

texts.en:
Cosmas is 37 years of age, married, and blessed with three children. He sells vegetables in Kangundo town and has been in this business for seven years. He also runs a retail shop. He currently makes an estimated monthly income of KES.32,800.

This will be his third loan and he plans to use it to buy more vegetables, tomatoes and potatoes to sell. He also plans to buy more retail goods such as sugar, bars of soap and rice to sell in his retail shop. He has applied for a loan of KES.60,000.

He will use the anticipated income to pay school fees for his children. Cosmas hopes to open a supermarket and educate his children to higher levels.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables, tomatoes and potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela is a married woman with four children.  Adela is 36 years old, and has two children who are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur; Adela has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Adela requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional items like coffee, shampoo, canned goods, milk, juice, cereals, etc. to sell.

In the future, Adela would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional items like coffee, shampoo, canned goods, milk, juice, cereals, etc. to sell

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is 32 years old. She is married and has three children. This is a new loan product for UOB. The Post-Harvest Bridge Loan is a top up loan for farmers who have received the Agric Production financing for the maize production and who are waiting for their harvest to be bought by the buyers. UOB’s farmer clients are benefiting from the production financing which is significantly improving their yield or production.  During the post-harvest processes, they are suffering poverty as they have to wait for the buyer to pay them. This Kiva Loan will play a big role as a bridge for solving their primary day-to-day needs during the period.

loans.use: To pay for a warehouse construction/store for maize production.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush lives in Kapan town with her husband and three children (ages 21, 17 and 8). 

For three years, Anush has been involved in a cosmetics retail business. She requests cosmetics from different companies in Yerevan town and sells them in Kapan. She has now requested this loan to be able to purchase a new stock of cosmetics and body care products for reselling to her customers. 

Anush has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.
